group_1.textRight: Many thanks for your guidance today!

group_1.textLeft: I see you've improved a lot in your unique magic@of "Target Redirection", haven't you?
...By the way, Yuna.
Hikaru has told you about Juri, hasn't she?

group_1.textRight: In fact, I came across that girl myself not too@long ago...

group_1.narration: "Hah. So you're that bitch's new lackey, huh?"
"Well, guess I've got a new toy to play with."
"Looks as though you're as much of a@war freak as they say..."
"You know, some Magical Girls are unable to operate@out of fear of your retaliation."
"Given that being Magical Girls is already a dangerous task,@we ought to work hand-in-hand with one another."
"Nah, what you mean is this is a society where you get@to beat up the strong and the ones you don't like."
"Ain't no way in hell I'm giving up such a@perfect stage, myself."

group_1.textRight: That girl was just as I had heard...

group_1.textLeft: Right...
Yuna, what do you think about this situation
of Juri subduing other Magical Girls by force?

group_1.textRight: ...Subduing others through force is not the right@way to go.

group_1.textLeft: ...Indeed.
You see, I'm seeking to change this current@situation
so as to bring peace to the Magical Girls of@Futatsugi.
That's where you come in, Yuna. I want to put you@in charge of this case.
Yeah, you.
With your capabilities and your way of thinking...@I was thinking that I can entrust you with this.
I will follow up with you, of course, and Hikaru@will also be assisting you.
...Will you accept the responsibility?

group_1.textRight: (...Excessive repression will one day lead@to rebellion.)
(I am all too painfully aware of that fact...)
(Well, then, there is only one answer...)
...I'll do it. Please leave this to me.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you, Yuna.
...Hey, do you remember the question I asked@you when we first met?

group_1.textRight: About what it takes to get someone to listen@to you...right?

group_1.textLeft: Well, you said it'd be earnestness of attitude@and action.
I agree with you, and I don't want you to forget@that thought.
Juri is no regular Magical Girl. Dealing with her@won't be easy...
She only listens to those who are stronger than@her, you see.
Yes... It's going to be a difficult task.

group_1.textRight: ...Please give me some time to think about this.

group_1.textLeft: That's exactly what I always intended.
Let's have a strategy meeting with Hikaru too@on the day after tomorrow.
